subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Chad Campbell used a fast start and Vaughn Taylor and Colt Knost had strong finishes to share the first-round lead at four-under 67 in the RBC Heritage in Hilton Head Island, S.C.
snippet: Chad Campbell used a fast start and Vaughn Taylor and Colt Knost had strong finishes to share the first-round lead at four-under 67 in the RBC Heritage in Hilton Head Island, S.C.
